snippet: With a toe in the food industry, Francisco Ramos, 19, who moved to the United States last year, now aspires to become a prep cook....
abstract: Children's Aid Society, one of eight agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Francisco Ramos of Bronx prepare for high school equivalency exam and land job at Yankee Stadium food stand.
lead_paragraph: With a toe in the food industry, Francisco Ramos, 19, who moved to the United States last year, now aspires to become a prep cook.

headline.print_headline: Young Immigrant Seizes a Culinary Opportunity
headline.main: A New Immigrant Hopes for a Culinary Career

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
